﻿INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION                                              Page: 1,113
STATEMENT OF DEVELOPMENT CREDITS / GRANTS - Nov 30, 2014
NOTES
1. THE U.S. DOLLARS EQUIVALENT OF THE ORIGINAL PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OFCREDIT DENOMINATED IN SDRS IS SHOWN
AT THE RATE APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS
2. CANCELLATIONS ARE SHOWN AT THE ORIGINAL EXCHANGE RATE OF BOARD APPROVAL;BUT, DISBURSED REPAID IDA,
SOLD 3RD PARTY, AND REPAID 3RD PARTY ARE SHOWN AT THE EXCHANGE RATE APPLICABLE ON THE DATE OF THIS TRANSACTION DATES.
HOWEVER, THE UNDISBURSED, DUE IDA, DUE 3RD PARTY AND CREDITS HELD ARE VALUED AT THE EXCHANGE RATE APPLICABLE
ON THE DATE OF THIS REPORT.
3. AGREEMENTS IN THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF USD  1,923,620,700.77 PROVIDING FOR THESE DEVELOPMENT CREDITS
HAVE BEEN SIGNED. BUT THE DEVELOPMENT CREDITS HAVE NOT BECOME EFFECTIVE AND DISBURSEMENT THERE UNDER
WILL NOT START UNTIL THE BORROWER TAKES CERTAIN STEPS AND FURNISHES CERTAIN DOCUMENTS TO THE ASSOCIATION.
4. THE ASSOCIATION HAS APPROVED AND INDICATED ITS WILLINGNESS, SUBJECT TO CERTAIN CONDITIONS, TO EXECUTE THESE
DEVELOPMENT CREDITS IN THE AMOUNT OF USD  3,572,320,970.40
5. THIS DEVELOPMENT CREDIT INCLUDES A GRANT PARTICIPATION
6. REPRESENTS CREDIT MADE AT THE TIME WHEN THE AUTHORITIES ON TAIWAN REPRESENTED CHINA IN THE ASSOCIATION
AUTHORITIES ON TAIWAN HAVE AGREED TO SERVICE THESE DEBTS.
7. THE ORIGINAL PRINCIPAL OF THESE CREDITS UNDER REPLENISHMENTS 1 TO 4 HAS BEEN INCREASED BY THE AMOUNT OF THE
TRANSLATION ADJUSTMENT AS A RESULT OF THE DEVALUATION OF THE UNITED STATES DOLLAR IN 1972 AND 1973.
8. THESE CREDITS HAVE BEEN SOLD TO THE HIPC TRUST FUND AS OF JULY 01, 1998.
9. THESE CREDITS HAVE BEEN SOLD TO THE HIPC TRUST FUND AS OF AUGUST 31,1999.
10. THESE CREDITS HAVE BEEN SOLD TO THE HIPC TRUST FUND AS OF DECEMBER 1, 1999.
11. THESE CREDITS HAVE BEEN SOLD TO THE HIPC TRUST FUND AS OF NOVEMBER 1, 2000.
12. THESE CREDITS HAVE BEEN SOLD TO THE HIPC TRUST FUND AS OF NOVEMBER 16, 2000.
13. THIS CREDIT HAS BEEN SPLIT AS ITS PARTIALLY ELIGIBLE FOR DEBT RELIEF UNDER THE MULTILATERAL DEBT RELIEF INITIATIVE.
14. THIS CREDIT HAS BEEN WRITTEN OFF UNDER THE MULTILATERAL DEBT RELIEF INITIATIVE.
15. REPAID IDA INCLUDES AMOUNTS WRITTEN OFF UNDER THE MULTILATERAL DEBTRELIEF INITIATIVE.
